normalized: the night gives way to the dawn of a new day.
it's finally time to set out.
our destination is where aishe is, kouten tower -- the tower of crimson heavens.
all to dig up clues on barde, the one behind everything.
and, to save the kidnapped miki.
i'm not the same as i once was.
i can fight now with my awakened immortal powers.
my spirit rises all the more for it.

name: rikurou
normalized: alright!
but still…
what happened last night was honestly a wonderful surprise.
a night of celebration truly befitting the departure of a man reborn.
man, that was nice…

name: rikurou
normalized: (oop, better stop now…)
i'm liable to pop a boner right here if i'm not careful.
and that would certainly not befit said departure.

name: rikurou
normalized: all～～right!
i squat and smack my cheeks to get myself fired back up again.

name: annerose
normalized: hmhm, now you're cooking, rick.
just don't overdo it and start spinning yourself in circles.

name: rikurou
normalized: just leave it to me!

name: michiko
normalized: fulfill your immortal duty!
stupid human!

name: michiko
normalized: don't trip up, don't slip up, don't mess up, don't let up, got it?
i'm serious!

name: rikurou
normalized: yeah, count on it.
michiko encourages me, the same as she did last night.
really, this is a new side of her.

name: annerose
normalized: michiko, give it to him.

name: michiko
normalized: okay.
stupid human, this is for you.
michiko pulls kongo yasha from her skirt and holds it out to me.

name: rikurou
normalized: f-for me…?

name: michiko
normalized: stupid, who's supposed to hold onto it if you don't?

name: rikurou
normalized: o-oh yeah… right…
with both hands, i take kongo yasha from her.
it's profoundly heavy.
it's the weight of michiko's trust.
i can feel michiko trusting me with annerose more than words or actions can describe.

name: annerose
normalized: alright, let's get moving.

name: rikurou
normalized: o-okay.
kongo yasha in hand, i follow after annerose.
neu left me with parting words as i did so.

name: neu
normalized: young lad, barde is a mighty opponent.
your strength will be needed before the end.
take care of little anne.

name: rikurou
normalized: got it, i'll do my best out there.

name: annerose
normalized: rick!
annerose calls out to me.

name: rikurou
normalized: ah, coming!
s-see you guys later!
after giving a quick bow to neu and michiko, i jog up next to annerose.

name: michiko
normalized: that stupid human, if he screws this up i'm not going to let him off easy.

name: neu
normalized: oh, i wouldn't worry.
he's going to make a fine immortal… keeheehee!

name: michiko
normalized: grandma, you're kind of creeping me out.

name: neu
normalized: and what about you?
will you be staying awhile?

name: michiko
normalized: i'm going to head back.
it's up to me to keep the house safe until they return.

name: neu
normalized: ahh, of course.

name: michiko
normalized: plus, you keep your place too picked up for me anyway.
see ya!
